title: Inside Story: Scarface (2012)
description:
Go behind the scenes on one of the most influential gangster movies of all time and discover through cast and crew interviews, stock footage and original material, a first hand account of the trials and tribulations which almost prevented it from being competed. The ambitious remake of the 1932 gangster classic almost fell over thanks to egotistical creators, a grandiose star, and its over the top style; but came through to become a cult hit through VHS and DVD sales and pop culture phenomenon.

[Unfortunately there are large hard-coded subtitles burned into this TVRip but it's the only copy of this excellent documentary i can find]
